title: Stakewinner
author: Stakewinner
created_time: March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMLast edit: March 20, 2023, 01:31:33 AM by Stakewinner
content: You can see the video here I beat the site and take their money follow me for more big wins like thishttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T0mHEW-Or00&feature=emb_err_woyt

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Congratulations but you need to put a disclaimer that you are not an expert if you cannot guarantee continuous winning if you can show your winnings you should also be honest to show your losses, like a guy who posted his winning but also shows his losses to show gambling is gambling its still luck even if you have years of experience.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Congrats, that a huge win in just a 1 minute, however, I don't think we need to follow you, just put your bet here instead, specially if you are into sport betting. As obviously we can't always follow you on like betting in a black jack or any card games.And as @robelneo said, majority of gamblers whether offline or online just like to let everyone knows of their big wins.But on the other hand, they might have lost more than they win in their gambling activities.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: Congratulations on the big win. Everyone wants to be winners, but that doesn't happen all the time. Today it looked to be a lucky day for you. You've understood and stopped at the right point, if not in the upcoming bets you might've lost. We don't know what would be the outcome in the next bets, which means you're not in a situation to give assurance on win. So, it is good that you won and that doesn't mean you an expert to be followed.Maybe you can make some series wins and post it with the statistics of your entire gambling activities. This could let people know your wins and losses which is a must to decide whether to follow your bets or not.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: Is it possible to count cards online, I think theres very few ways to gain an advantage normally.  The best chance of good odds is beating other players not the house as online is usually too locked down, not that I'd imagine I would pull off any trick to my advantage playing in the middle of a live casino either.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: Congratulations to you for your winning at least you have proved to us that you have a good strategy that is good enough to give you some winnings. I have seen many gamblers complaining about there bet especially on blackjack but you are so confident and I hope we are going to see more of your impressive results soon. This is why gambling is all about consistency because we may not know when we are going to hit a jackpot that is going to give us a big winning.

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on March 17, 2023, 11:19:04 PMCongratulations but you need to put a disclaimer that you are not an expert if you cannot guarantee continuous winning if you can show your winnings you should also be honest to show your losses, like a guy who posted his winning but also shows his losses to show gambling is gambling its still luck even if you have years of experience.He just made this post to gain followers and I don't see any problem with it. At least he posted a disclaimer that he is not an expert so that he's followers will not expect huge to him while betting nor even following what he do on stake. @OP this is great win a fast one imagine in 1 minute you made that but anyways that's not gonna happen always since even you are good playing blackjack winning will not only come but at least you enjoy the game and that add up the entertainment factor you can brought to your follower on your youtube channel.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Congratulations for your relatively big win on Stake. I never had luck on Blackjack, honestly.I must say that you are free to gamble and publish on youtube and any other social media any content you want. But it is obvious, no one can always win on any online casino.If you only are going to share your wins then a disclaimer should be added on your channel, so some users won't believe you are a dishonest person.Or you could also add a small section in your channel dedicated to your losses taking a format of short video-blogs. At least, that is something I would do, for the sake of being honest to my viewers.Good luck!

comments.author: len01
comments.body: maybe he is in promoting his youtube channel. lolcongratulations on your victory OP, you are one of the lucky people to get $500 in just 1 minute and that sometimes has never been experienced by other people.but to be honest I'm curious about all your bets. I mean, I also want to see your full bet, not just 1 minute. so I can see what strategy you use. maybe it would be better if you also share it here.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: Stakewinner on March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMYou can see the video here I beat the site and take their money follow me for more big wins like thishttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T0mHEW-Or00&feature=emb_err_woytWinning is a thing but I'm sure that is not the way to beat the site, not unless you will stop gambling and just transfer to another site.Anyway, congratulations on your winnings and will watch some of your videos to see how you did that. You can ask someone to follow you but its better to clear that you are not encouraging everyone to gamble the way you do, and you are just sharing your experience without expecting anything in return.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: As per checking, you make a risk of waging with the amount of 500$ and we know how the blackjack game works if you win it will double your wages and of course, it has a different price once you make with a blackjack of scoring of 21, not all the time its work like making a huge amount of bet I guess good strategy right there is the martingale the most common one, ideal after that is to back to your normal wages and try again until you gain profit for multiple games and make another wage of 500$ so you won't get bothered with the high-risk game.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: STT on March 17, 2023, 11:40:36 PMIs it possible to count cards online, I think theres very few ways to gain an advantage normally.  The best chance of good odds is beating other players not the house as online is usually too locked down, not that I'd imagine I would pull off any trick to my advantage playing in the middle of a live casino either.I don't think that's possible? I mean casinos were able to figure out that using multiple decks would counter card counting, I hardly doubt they wouldn't implement it online where it's also really easy to implement. Anw grats to op, wouldn't really say that this is a rare case, there are probably a lot of instances out there that are pretty much the same as op. I reckon anyone can win $500 in a minute if they really wanted to, especially in cases of videos, they just have to record a good run and not the entirety of it. I'd say I'd follow a person more if they posted both wins and losses, like what @robelneo said. Now that dictates how much of a good (and lucky) gambler you really are.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Congratulations butQuote from: Stakewinner on March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMI beat the site and take their money follow me for more big wins like thisI don't know what you mean by this. You're not going to be able to beat HE in the long run. Are you only going to advertise the times you win?

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: Congratulations on your winning. Not many Blackjack players can win $500 in 1 minute. Did you quit after getting that big win? Or do you continue by playing a few more rounds? What is the result?I've never won at BlackJack because I'm not as good at playing it as other people. I want to see your BlackJack game again in the next game and I hope you can provide the video again here. And hopefully, you can win a lot more in a short time.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Stakewinner on March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMYou can see the video here I beat the site and take their money follow me for more big wins like thishttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T0mHEW-Or00&feature=emb_err_woytTo make this fact straight. You won only 250$ since the other half is your bet. Also there’s nothing new here because many streamers is playing on Stake and betting max bet on the table.Watching 250$ spread on 7 seats is not amusing. You should improve too your video quality if you want to get more views because your cp to laptop video has a very poor video quality. You should use screen record app on your laptop instead of manually filming it using your phone.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Quote from: Stakewinner on March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMYou can see the video here I beat the site and take their money Focus on your winnings because that's the best way not to remember how much you've spent.  Well, congratulations on the win and don't try to play it again. Usually, the ambition to achieve more than that is the only option for aggressive gamblers who don't know when to leave the casino. Btw, you are not beating the house at all with just $500, believe me the casino house has got more profit than you thought.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Stakewinner on March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMI beat the site and take their money Congratulations, but be careful. You can win big today, remember that gambling is a game of luck. I do not bet this big, but with the little amount of money that I am using to bet, I have favoured days and unfavored days too. Quote from: Stakewinner on March 17, 2023, 11:12:53 PMfollow me for more big wins like thisIt would be good if we follow you more on both profit and loss, not possible for gamblers to always win.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Congrats bro, you are playing on the right casino site and of course you are not the only one who might win it, there are many out there who might also get big wins from playing blackjack at Stake, I think just enjoy your game there friends. I wish you always good luck there , sorry for not following you because I still enjoy playing with Limbo

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You know Stake.com has a nice feature, where you scroll down and then you click on "My Bets" ..... then you show us you bet history too. You cannot just show us 1 bet outcome (Win) and then call yourself an expert.  If you want to share something, work out a good winning Blackjack strategy and share that with us. We can then test that strategy and if it works, you can be rewarded.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: It's obviously for the purpose of adding more followers and subscribers. Well, if you could prove that you could do this over and over again then you might just be successful in doing so. I mean, one guy who won a long parlay shared it here in the forum and is now being swarmed by a lot of users to share his picks. Who knows if that could also happen to you?Anyway, congratulations on your win and I wish there will be more to come. One thing is for sure, beating the house will be a large task so you will need a lot of luck for that to happen. I have my own share of big wins but I don't usually post them on streaming services or even record it. Out of curiosity, are you trying to be a streamer for them?
